description: Change of use from retail (Class A1) to Dwelling (Class C3)
decision_conditions: This application requires a fee under Regulation 14 of The Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications, Deemed Applications, Requests and Site Visits) (England) (Amendment) Regulations 2019You have not paid the requisite fee and as such your application has been Refused.For the avoidance of doubt, the proposed development has not been assessed against the limitations and conditions contained in Part 3 of Class M of Schedule 2 of to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Your attention is drawn to the fact that planning permission does not override property rights and any ancient rights of light that may exist. This permission does not empower you to enter onto land not in your ownership without the specific consent of the owner. If you require further information or advice, you should consult a solicitor.
Please be advised that only Certificate B can be completed and submitted, not also Certificate A. Kindly resubmit so that your application can be validated
